content: प्रत्यादिश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} ({%a%}) To reject, discard, shun; प्रत्यादिष्टविशेषमंडनविधिः <ls>Ś. 6. 5.</ls> ({%b%}) To repulse; प्रत्यादिदेशैनमभाषमाणा <ls>R. 6. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To cast off, repudiate (as a person); कामं प्रत्यादिष्टां स्मरामि न परिग्रहं मुनेस्तनयां <ls>Ś. 5. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To obscure, eclipse, defeat, throw into the shade or background; <ls>R. 1. 61</ls>; <ls n="R.">10. 68.</ls> {@--4@} To order back, countermand. {@--5@} To direct, prescribe, enjoin. {@--6@} To warn, caution. {@--7@} To report to. {@--8@} To summon. {@--9@} To conquer, overcome. {@--10@} To remove, set aside.
